content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, I see you're wearing new clothes!
This outfit looks wonderful on you.
Would you mind sharing which brands they're from?

content:
<color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>, you look great in your new clothes~
I once saw this gorgeous starry-themed outfit...
But unfortunately, they didn't have it in my size.
